Subclasses of ScriptLoader in cello.alt.servlet.script
 class ContextScriptLoader
          This class provides a ServletContext based ScriptLoader.
 class DirectoryScriptLoader
          This class provides a standard filesystem directory based ScriptLoader.
 class JarScriptLoader
          A ScriptLoader object that uses a compressed archive (.jar/.zip) to look for resources.
 class MultiScriptLoader
          This class provides a way to search multiple ScriptLoaders from a single ScriptLoader.
